text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha jaakumu l-mu'minatu muhajiratin fa-im'tahinuhunna l-lahu aʿlamu biimanihinna fa-in ʿalim'tumuhunna mu'minatin fala tarjiʿuhunna ila l-kufari la hunna hillun lahum wala hum yahilluna lahunna waatuhum ma anfaqu wala junaha ʿalaykum an tankihuhunna idha ataytumuhunna ujurahunna wala tum'siku biʿisami l-kawafiri wasalu ma anfaqtum walyasalu ma anfaqu dhalikum huk'mu l-lahi yahkumu baynakum wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun
